channel.title: Do all hosters get lag?
channel.description:
Hello there.
I'm hosting a server for a friend, and when I'm playing on the server I host, I lag pretty badly....
Is this the case with all hosters?
Thanks :)

item.title: Do all hosters get lag?
item.dc:creator: @I_D3nic_I I D3nic I
item.description:
@I_D3nic_I wrote:

[quote=“Newbi, post:11, topic:36632”]Yes you will lagg, its a plain fact,

Make sure you just have the runserver.bat and the moparisthebest.com window up… thats pretty much all you can do to stop it a little

-Newbi[/quote]

Thanks for your reply.

When I’m hosting I try to have minimal programs running… I usually just have MSN, Moparscape and the runserver.bat open… And sometimes WMP… Having these open doesn’t really put much stress on my CPU… But when there’s a lot of people on the server my commit charge can reach up to 1000…

Well at least I know now that hosting will make me lag when playing…

I get used to it, I ain’t hosting for too long any way, my mate is taking over again in a week or so.

Read full topic

@I_D3nic_I wrote:

BUMP… !!

Thanks for the other replies guys…

Can I get one more confirmation please, and then I’ll be happy.

ya i lag to…
U need real good comp to not lag when many people come on.

item.title: Do all hosters get lag?
item.dc:creator: @I_D3nic_I I D3nic I
item.description:
@I_D3nic_I wrote:

[quote=“Nics, post:5, topic:36632”][quote author=I D3nic I link=topic=52140.msg641697#msg641697 date=1166425102]
Hello there.

I’m hosting a server for a friend, and when I’m playing on the server I host, I lag pretty badly…

Is this the case with all hosters?

Thanks
[/quote]

Yep, youll lag. Do this, if you have a second computer, Host the server on your main hosting computer, and play on the server from the other computer :)! Its what i do… BUT I CANT GET THE NEW JDK!!![/quote]

Thanks for this… All’s I wanted to know if who ever is hosting it will lag when playing the server…

Well at least now I know ! Can any one else confirm this please?

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Do all hosters get lag?
item.dc:creator: @Nics Nics
item.description:
@Nics wrote:

[quote=“I D3nic I, post:1, topic:36632”]Hello there.

I’m hosting a server for a friend, and when I’m playing on the server I host, I lag pretty badly…

Is this the case with all hosters?

Thanks :)[/quote]

Yep, youll lag. Do this, if you have a second computer, Host the server on your main hosting computer, and play on the server from the other computer :)! Its what i do… BUT I CANT GET THE NEW JDK!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Do all hosters get lag?
item.dc:creator: @I_D3nic_I I D3nic I
item.description:
@I_D3nic_I wrote:

[quote=“k3zzer, post:2, topic:36632”]It’s because you have a 600MHZ Cpu, and 128MB ram.

Lol only joking D3nic, yea he hosts my server, he has 3GHZ CPU, 1GB RAM, and he complains of lag. I don’t know why really, he feels the lagg once the server hits 20+ users.[/quote]

Yeah, after 20 users it just lags like hell… Right now there is 30ish people on… And for me it’s way too laggy…[br][size=1]Posted at: December 17, 2006, 08:04:41 PM[/size][hr]BUMP… Please… Just reply saying if when you host you get lag or not…

Read full topic
